Title: The Conformist
Writer: Alberto Moravia (novel), Bernardo Bertolucci (screenplay), Lee Kresel (written by: English version)
Actors: Jean-Louis Trintignant, Stefania Sandrelli, Gastone Moschin, Enzo Tarascio
Plot: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 7 nominations.
Production: Mars Film, Maran Film, Marianne Productions
